name: project.ONE
description:
2-day project to test out C# in Godot as of version 3.0.2. Lack of docs was pretty annoying, hopefully its not an issue as of 3.1.0. Translating from GDscript to what did seem intuitive in C# proved wrong so many times.

Authors: Paweł Giemza (programming, design) && Michał Kręcisz (level design)
